name: overmedicated
text: A comment left by overmedicated was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by wildcat, 7th_shot, Ariamaki, La_Groink, Connellingus, Kleptonis, rascaldom, _cheesekayke, Private_Public, NDCaesar, tehloki, PEZ, Lokiamis, Madoushi, LiquidCruelty, Dhinson, Pigs)

name: untilyouaresonude
text: I mean, he's just SLAMMING that piss down his throat!

name: hexjumper
text: And he looks so furious as he does it, as if everybody has been lying to him up to this point as to what he's been eating and drinking. He will not wait another moment to eat dinosaur eggs and drink king piss.

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by lamboyster, Crowpaw, fosters, farqussus, Chelloveck, LordPretzel, SpinyNorman, anewcede)

name: mollywap
text: saint is that a picture of you?

name: afrothunder
text: I think it is Sylar, from Heroes.

name: saint
text: it is sylar from heroes

name: ravindra108
text: Was this the one that pushed you over the edge? I notice you changed your avatar soon after this post.

name: saint
text:
Certainly did sour quickly of people asking who my picture was of...as if it had some bearing on the topic at hand to beg consistent interrogation.

Not in this particular case, but you gather my case.
Bitches ask they questions.

name: ravindra108
text: And as I recall, you avatar even said "Sylar" on it... so... yeah.

name: saint
text: Some dudes just don't pay attention.

name: pigeon_street
text: Nothing will ever be better than Pitch Black 2.

name: yeshua_hamashia
text: What about Planet Piss?  Ya'know (Murderfaces' solo project?).  Phillipe would drink a planet sized piss.  holla

name: mantasmicdude
text: glugglugGLUGgluggluglglugGLUGLGUGglug

name: nsrdude
text: A comment left by nsrdude was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by alexrosenbaum, Ariamaki, sredni, Tucky, bug, Danjoebak, Private_Public, Ebessan, NDCaesar, brzbee, twohats, boswelljn, wehavemagnums)

name: tekende
text: As soon as Philippe heard the word "king," everything following it became a mere hushed buzzing sound.

name: norsef
text: Well more like the sound of static, a sort of pshhhhhh sound if you will.

name: spicyponyhead
text: or... pisssssssssssssssssss?

name: william
text: I wonder if Onstad actually uses this technique in real life.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: Easily top five material. Angry eating gets me every time.

name: st_elmos_fire
text: Eating and the combination of any strongly expressed emotion, is golden

name: hbaranov
text: Like the piss of Kings

name: st_elmos_fire
text: hmmm would the piss of kings be truly golden, like gold metal gold, or golden like the golden color of people's piss only more golden. I'm thinking it must be metallic gold . . . it MUST BE

name: stereo
text:
This is because Kings only drink that booze with gold flecks in it

aww yeah, classy as hell

name: greenkoolayd
text: Goldschläger

name: i_love_kate
text: That stuff is dog shit

name: deusoma
text: Enjoy, then.

name: greenkoolayd
text: wtf!?

name: carlyle
text:
What he's eating:
A banana


What he's crying about:
This damned banana

name: mystkmanat
text:
Oh sweet baby Jesus. Oh dear lord. Holy hell. The video a ways down the page of a guy named Jeff eating vanilla yogurt and crying because his cat bit his toe... I know Jeff in real life. He is my ex-boyfriend.

Guess I really dodged the bullet on that one.

name: supahlovah
text:
Maybe one day I can be your ex boyfriend. :D

I mean, we both like manatees.

name: art-vader
text: yeah. who wants to hang around someone with a toe-biting cat?

name: danjoebak
text: it's great seein Phillipe act like a total brat 5 year old...and then think he's drinking a glass of piss. I would laugh if all Achewood strips ended this way.

name: iovine
text: I'd have to say Phillipe is a good kid.  But even he's a brat sometimes.  This was good to see.

name: chrissketch
text: Like Nemo waking up from a nightmare in every strip?

name: wehavemagnums
text: Gasp! ARBLE GABBLE GLUG GLUG GLUG!

name: catachresis
text: ARBLE GABBLE GOBBLE GREEBLE is some all-time great onomatopeia.

name: philosophe
text: I gave this one a 5 based on 'GREEBLE' alone.

name: mastronaut
text: Did Greeble shoot first?

name: soticoto
text: Han shot first!

name: jlynes
text: A comment left by jlynes was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by riotdejaneiro, kenthegod, HSE, Direhaggis, Mastronaut, wehavemagnums)

name: tourach3
text: you sir, are INCORRECT

name: jlynes
text:
I meant this in response to mastronaut, not soticoto. Curse my fingers of fury.

Of course Han shot first. I can never forgive myself.

name: soticoto
text: Obi-Wan forgives you.

name: aaron_haynes
text: Agreed. You can keep your om nom nom, I'll stick with my arble bargle and friends.

name: lolsworth
text: No doubt. Although Don Martin was on a whole other planet with onomatopoeia, it's not fair to compare him to anyone or anything.

name: epicurus
text: A comment left by epicurus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Unfun, le_chien_manquee, coffeecoaster, Siah)

name: evilrobot
text: This strip adequately explains how to deal with 5 year olds.  It should be included in most parenting manuals and instructional videos related to children.

name: alejandroadam
text:
one thing that never works is convincing them it is something they want to eat, like
kid "what IS this?"
me "it is ice cream/chocolate/plain cheese on bread"
kid "nuh unh" (thorws meal on floor)

never tried the magical/prehistorical angle though.

name: iovine
text: I told my little brother a chicken drumstick was chocolate.  He bought it.

name: bixschmix
text: Apparently, my parents had to literally force me to try ice cream when I was little. (Guess what? I liked it!)

name: charchar
text: I love(d) dinosaurs when I was growing up, and my dad used to tell me that brocolli was little trees and also what dinosaurs ate.

name: miku224
text: One of my earliest memories is of my older sister telling me that I should eat my salad because it was "Brontosaurus Food."

name: mystkmanat
text:
I used to love cucumber slices, and when I ate them, my dad would pretend to be their little vegetable souls crying out for help. "No!" he'd say, "Don't eat me!!!" every single time I tried to take a bite.

I no longer eat cucumbers.

name: i_love_kate
text: I think your dad had the wrong idea, pretty much.

name: soticoto
text:
Meh. When I was a kid, if I refused to eat something, my mother would test it on the cats. I generally figured that if the cats were willing to eat something that I could probably eat it too.
Then again, a lot of the stuff the cats wouldn't touch... and so my mother could never get me to eat that stuff.

name: qatipay
text: A comment left by qatipay was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Norsef, mattbeetee, GeyserShitdick, ConnorMc, kenyot, shounenhero)

name: zem
text: A comment left by zem was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Norsef, Satyr, SotiCoto)

name: soticoto
text:
How many times was it stated that Philippe was 5?

If someone comes up to you in the street and tells you they're 5.... and then you meet them again 2 years later... are they still 5?

name: aelindil
text: Only if they say they are.

name: jlynes
text:
No one needs to say that Philippe is five.

He is five.

No amount of speech, or even an actual awareness of how many calendar years have passed, can change that.

He is five.

name: soticoto
text: Someone should get Philippe one of those badges with a big 5 on it... like I had when I was 5.

name: bixschmix
text:
At Hobby Lobby, they sell ribbons that say "I can dress myself!"

I bought one when I was a sophomore in high school and gave it to my friend as a present. It was the Saddest Thing.

name: onepapertiger
text:
Anybody remember those Klaymation videos on newgrounds.com by Knox? Back in the day? In one a clay man tries to convince another clay man that they are brothers. He shows him a picture of their house from when they were little and it's a Hobby Lobby. I never knew it was an actual store and just died laughing everytime.

I know, hilarious .

name: tekende
text: I used to work at the Hobby Lobby warehouse. I detest, nay, loathe , Hobby Lobby now and refuse to shop there anymore.

name: spicyponyhead
text: I wouldn't shop at a place called Hobby Lobby. And here I thought hair salons had the corner on Bad Names (A Cut Above, BarberElla, etc)

name: mystkmanat
text: We have one named Curl Up and Dye.

name: zoeofdoom
text: i see you also were an awesome toddler with many friends, as i was. they had to pry that fucking thing off me once i wasn't five no more. PRY.

name: soticoto
text: They had to pry my 5 badge away as well... but that was because I kept trying to perform acupuncture on the other kids.

name: heccibiggs
text: You consider a five-year-old a toddler? As far as I'm concerned, a toddler is three at the oldest.

name: ford
text: hey, look who's being a dick about terms!

name: fineoakstructure
text: Or just being correct.

name: hoboninja
text: Someone might say that he is not five, but he will just sit there being five and they will be wrong.

name: soticoto
text: In far later news... I saw a kid yesterday in the street with a t-shirt that had I AM 5 written on it, and the 5 was HUGE ... and I wondered if the kid was called Philippe... I just did. Y'know?

name: lolsworth
text: If they are Philippe then yes

name: qwerty
text: A comment left by qwerty was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by aquamuffin, Siah, Aiglos)

name: deusoma
text: This is the best alt text that has ever appeared on any picture on the internet, ever.

name: wulvaine
text: I just see your avatar and automatically read the alt text you quoted as "THIS! IS! ACHEWOOD!"

name: jonmw
text: I just think "IT'S NOT A TOOMAH"

name: cbtbone
text: This was the first strip I read, and it was indeed the alt text, combined with the furious look on Phillipe's face that got me hooked.

name: steerpike66
text: There is actually a very strong link between diet and aggression. Junk food makes you angry and depressed. Philippe really needs a cool glass or two of king piss to chill him the fuck out.

name: mike24
text: liebot makes a wonderful parent

name: unfun
text: Yes.  For once Lie Bot uses his powers for good.

name: orvel
text:
Lie Bot lies neither for good nor evil.

Lie Bot just lies.

name: history
text: Except about the day that teodor died.

name: joeyramoney
text: ARBLEGABBLEGOBBLEGREEBLEARBLEGABBLEGOBBLEGREEBLEARBLEGABBLEGOBBLEGREEBLEARBLEGABBLE OBBLEGREEBLE

name: straw
text: ONE OF US! ONE OF US!

name: steev_dayv
text: is it Friday already?

name: holly_golightly
text:
I completely get what you are saying. As soon as I saw this strip my first thought was "Wow, what a wonderful nod to Waterson":
[IMGS OFF]
... and it made me love Achewood even more.

name: holly_golightly
text:
Damn. One more time:
[IMGS OFF]
My apologies, I'm kida new to commenting on here.

name: holly_golightly
text: I give up, you all get the idea. I welcome the much deserved lames.

name: greenkoolayd
text: what in hell is wrong with you?  you were victorious twice, but you still couldnt accept it...... do you have the depression?  do you need a hug?  how about a sammich?

name: stuart
text:
Actually, I was thinking of a Sunday strip that used the same gag.

Also, does Assetbar still throw a shitfit if you claim that you've ever used meaningful ratings?

name: molesticide
text:
'streaming-tears' philippe is my highlight.

all

"getting yelled at while dying of starvation, APPARENTLY"

name: pseudochron
text: Ahh. Once the conventional wisdom, but lately refuted.

name: mugi
text: Philippe's furiously crying face cracks me up every time.

name: lolsworth
text: I love Téodor's deadpan humour.

name: awko
text: There was a plum wine called "Kings Kiss" at the restaurant I went to last night. I misread it as "King Piss" and was all up to order me a glass until someone pointed out my mistake.

name: falseprophet
text: Chubby for you and whoever it was vigilant enough to make certain that his friend imbibes nothing but the best royal bodily fluids.

name: lauralou
text: I wonder which is preferable, starvation or diabetes?

name: boredom_man
text: You wonder this, do you? You wonder if diabetes is worse than starvation? And you are writing us.... from history?

name: clarcknova
text: from circumstances.

name: spicyponyhead
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: afronaut
text: Am i the only one who imagines liebot talking like Mitch Hedburg?

name: nicklon
text:
not for me, I am guessing because I do not equate machines with marijuana

lie-bot's voice is going to have a lot more metal in it than mitch's

name: brzbee
text: Not anymore.

name: tekende
text: For some reason, I can't help but hear LieBot's voice as sounding like Bugs Bunny. I think it's the gloves and (I don't know why) the glasses.

name: helloftubby
text: lie  bot using his powers for good

name: tekende
text: This is, hands down, my favorite Achewood strip. The first time I read it was at work, when I was employed as a bank teller. I was laughing so hard I was crying (and I mean tears all just STREAMING down my face), all the while trying not to attract too much attention to myself.

name: wittyname
text: Lie bot uses his powers for good!

name: myrrdisparo
text: 'King piss' sounds like the name of a really cheap beer to me. The kind that you drink on Sunday morning, when it is still Saturday night and you don't give a damn what gets pumped down your throat, so long as it's not alive

name: myrrdisparo
text: Still Saturday night *for* you, anyway

name: tourach3
text:
says i gave out too many chubbies :-(
but i'm glad to hear that i'm not the only fuckin person who does this

name: falseprophet
text: King piss is necessary for a growing boy to develop strong bones, healthy teeth, and an efficient parliament.

name: weapon86
text: There was a popcorn place I worked at which carried an ugly variety of ornange and green popcorn. It contained no distinct flavour, just overly sweet. We sold it to the kids as "Barney" popcorn, even after Barney had been taken from the air, and it was the first to sell. It just goes to show you can sell anything when choosing the right label for your demograph! In this case, we had to ensure the kids knew it was Dino eggs and Kings piss. Sold!

name: heccibiggs
text: But... Barney is purple.

name: lechatbotte
text: May have been their built-in sugar meters sensed the prescence of sweetness despite the name!

name: greenkoolayd
text: a business whose sole purpose is to sell popcorn?  surely you jest.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Tuesday Blogs

Onstad: Have you ever been so tired that your head got really hot?

Today's Blogs

Lyle: sfucking good wewekned

name: i_love_kate
text: Todd shoots someone.

name: direhaggis
text: So then the remaining vegetables on Phillipe's plate are edible tractors?

name: tekende
text: No, they're clumps of stuff that have fallen out of the treads of tractor tires.

name: steinhauser
text: I've done this since I was little and I still do it all the time. If I don't feel like eating some vegetables I just pretend I'm a dinosaur, and they're little people trying to run away. It always works.

name: dasuta
text:
I MUST DESTROY THOSE DINOSAUR EGGS!

KINGS PISS?! THIS DOES NOT BELONG IN A GLASS!

name: steev_dayv
text: My parents told me that baby potatoes were actually dinosaur eggs. I knew dinosaurs didn't exist anymore, but logic be damned!  I still gobble greeble them

name: housewife
text: A time-honored technique observed by many parents

name: kensai
text: The fact of the matter is that more times than not, Lie Bot uses his powers for good.

name: orvel
text: Lie Bot does not lie for good or evil. Lie Bot lies.

name: wonelove
text: I need an uncle or someone like Lie Bot

name: thatcrazycommie
text: Great alt text or the greatest alt text?

name: orvel
text:
From The Bartender's Handbook :

King Piss
3 oz. carrot juice
2 oz. red bull
2 oz. ketel one

name: cyberia
text: Top 5 strip. Nothing can top the otter's furious eating.

name: doomchild
text:
I'm surprised more people didn't find humor in Lie Bot's implication that until recently we as a society believed that children liked getting yelled at while starving.

I can just picture Teodor's frustrated tone of voice, followed by Lie Bot's wistful sigh as he says " Ah, once the conventional wisdom, but lately refuted. "

DC

P.S. This is my first Achewood comment ever. The magic begins now .

name: snuggles
text:
man this gag is from Calvin and Hobbes...

still funny though. and clearly Onstad is a Watterson fan, so it's a good tribute.

name: cleanfatback
text:
I remember that one!
Calvin's mom tells him that something is monkey brains and he gobbles it - but not furiously, if memory serves.

name: lechatbotte
text: Yeah, but never KING PISS (and the strip was weaker for it!)

name: inthetunk
text: Oh my god I forgot about this one

name: jhunter
text: EAT, DRINK KING PISS AND BE MERRY

name: kikineko
text: Oh Philippe's expression in most of these panels are awesome!  Also, wow... does King's piss have something magical for him to drink it quickly?

name: evilbobikus
text: Finally Lie Bot once again using his powers for good.

name: runningonempty
amp-d
text:
The best part of this is how shocked Lie Bot is.

Like, he knows it works, but he didn't it expect to go so far.

name: nyl
text: Wow, it's weird to see Philippe be bratty- he's usually so good! It must be confusing to be a parent

name: eonblue174
text: this is the best. no other

name: carlyle
text: T in panel five is platinum.

name: sock
text:
Philippe straight up devours those eggs.
Mother Dino will not be pleased. Oh well, she's probably tomorrow's dinner anyway.

name: rayonatoilet
text: "King Piss", staring Rod Huggins, was perhaps the best work of the Softboy collaboration.

name: missbee
text:
SIRS, CHUBBY THIS MAN.

And lo, the king's men did chubby him.

name: angekfire
text: So....aroungry.

name: hannibalv
text: This is the only appearance of Lie Bot that I actually like (well, except for when Lyle gives him the evisceration he so richly deserves), and more than anything I think it is because of the simple, elegant phrase "king piss".
